field_descriptions.Test Name: Name of Test to be executed
field_descriptions.Test Type: Type of test: Loops, Sweep or Shmoo
field_descriptions.COM Port: Serial Port to communicate to MB
field_descriptions.IP Address: IP Address to communicate to MB
field_descriptions.Content: Select your content: Linux or Dragon
field_descriptions.Test Number: First Number to be assigned to your test iteration
field_descriptions.Reset: Reset Unit before Starting first experiment
field_descriptions.FastBoot: If Mesh Masking is selected, set this to False
field_descriptions.Core License: License type or leave Blank if not used
field_descriptions.Pseudo Config: Set if using Pseudo Mesh Content
field_descriptions.Configuration (Mask): Mesh Options: RowPass1, RowPass2, ... Blank for FullDie
field_descriptions.Check Core: Used in Mesh Mode to check core data
field_descriptions.Boot Breakpoint: Point in the boot process to break
field_descriptions.Post Process: Script File to be loaded after Test Execution
field_descriptions.Linux Pre Command: Optional -- Linux Shell Command or script to be used before running Content
field_descriptions.Linux Post Command: Optional -- Linux Shell Command or script to be used after running Content
field_descriptions.Linux Pass String: Optional -- Linux Pass string if empty will use global fail string
field_descriptions.Linux Fail String: Optional -- Linux Fail string if empty will use global pass string
field_descriptions.Startup Linux: Optional -- Script to start linux from EFI -- usually bootlinux.nsh or startup_linux.nsh
field_descriptions.Linux Content Line 0: Content Command Line [ up to 10 can be set add more lines if required]
field_descriptions.Linux Content Line 1: Optional -- Content Command Line [ up to 10 can be set add more lines if required]
field_descriptions.Linux Content Line 2: Optional -- Content Command Line [ up to 10 can be set add more lines if required]
field_descriptions.Linux Content Line 3: Optional -- Content Command Line [ up to 10 can be set add more lines if required]
field_descriptions.Linux Content Line 4: Optional -- Content Command Line [ up to 10 can be set add more lines if required]
field_descriptions.Linux Content Line 5: Optional -- Content Command Line [ up to 10 can be set add more lines if required]
field_descriptions.Linux Content Line 6: Optional -- Content Command Line [ up to 10 can be set add more lines if required]
field_descriptions.Linux Content Line 7: Optional -- Content Command Line [ up to 10 can be set add more lines if required]
field_descriptions.Linux Content Line 8: Optional -- Content Command Line [ up to 10 can be set add more lines if required]
field_descriptions.Linux Content Line 9: Optional -- Content Command Line [ up to 10 can be set add more lines if required]
field_descriptions.Dragon Pre Command: Optional -- EFI Shell Command or script to be used before running Content
field_descriptions.Dragon Post Command: Optional -- EFI Shell Command or script to be used after running Content
field_descriptions.Startup Dragon: Optional -- Script with preset conditions for the content [ex. ReserveMemory]
field_descriptions.ULX CPU: ULX -- CPU to be used [GNR_B0, CWF]
field_descriptions.VVAR1: VVAR -- 32-bit fixed point value to scale VV[0x00] -- Use 80064000 for System
field_descriptions.VVAR2: VVAR -- Thread Count VVAR -- Mesh Content use: 0x1000000  -- Slice Content Use: GNR = 0x1000002, CWF = 0x1000004
field_descriptions.Dragon Content Line: Optional -- Filters to content, add them sepparated by comma
field_descriptions.Stop on Fail: Defines if run regression will stop after first fail
field_descriptions.Merlin Name: MERLIN -- Name of the Merlin file
field_descriptions.Merlin Drive: MERLIN -- Drive where Merlin is located
